conversations.content: 起飞，然后向右平移10米，接着向上升5米

aw.takeoff()
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] + 10, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] + 5])
环绕 tower2 飞一个半径为 10 米的圆形

points = []
for angle in range(0, 360, 10):
    x = 10 * math.cos(math.radians(angle)) + aw.get_position('tower2')[0]
    y = 10 * math.sin(math.radians(angle)) + aw.get_position('tower2')[1]
    points.append([x, y, aw.get_position('tower2')[2]])
aw.fly_path(points)
首先飞向太阳能板，然后向右平移12米，最后向下降6米

aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('solarpanels'))
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] + 12, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] - 6])
飞到 tower3 的左侧 2 米处

current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] - 3])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('crowd'))
首先向右平移10米，然后向下降5米，最后飞向第三个风力发电机

current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] + 10, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] - 5])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('turbine3'))
向上升7米并向右平移12米

current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] + 7])
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] + 12, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
环绕 solarpanels 飞一个半径为 15 米的圆形

aw.takeoff()
aw.fly_path([[aw.get_position('solarpanels')[0] + 15 * math.cos(math.radians(angle)), aw.get_position('solarpanels')[1] + 15 * math.sin(math.radians(angle)), aw.get_position('solarpanels')[2]] for angle in range(0, 360, 10)])
aw.land()
飞向人群并向左平移8米

aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('crowd'))
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] - 8, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
向左平移8米并飞向第一个塔

current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] - 8, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('tower1'))
飞向第二个风力发电机，然后向左平移10米，最后向上升4米

aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('turbine2'))
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] - 10, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] + 4])
朝 solarpanels 飞行并在上面 5 米处悬停
起飞，然后向上升7米，最后飞向太阳能板

aw.takeoff()
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] + 7])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('solarpanels'))
前进 10 米，然后再朝向螺旋桨向飞行
按照 tower1, car, solarpanels 这个路径飞行过去，中间在每个检查点暂停并确认其位置

aw.takeoff()
for check_pt in ['tower1', 'car', 'solarpanels']:
    aw.fly_to(aw.get_position(check_pt))
    print(f'Arrived at {check_pt} point, current location{aw.get_drone_position()}')
无人机以顺时针旋转90度
首先向右平移12米，接着向下降6米，然后飞向第三个风力发电机

current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] + 12, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] - 6])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('turbine3'))
飞到 car 附近再降落
起飞，然后向下降5米，接着飞向第一个塔

aw.takeoff()
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] - 5])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('tower1'))
飞向第一个塔，然后向左平移8米，最后向上升5米

aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('tower1'))
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] - 8, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] + 5])
飞于距离 turbine2 底部20米高度的位置
向上升4米并飞向汽车上方

current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] + 4])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('car'))
飞向人群，然后向下降6米，最后飞向第三个塔

aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('crowd'))
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] - 6])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('tower3'))
途经 tower1, solarpanels 再飞到 car
获得无人机当前的朝向
途经 solarpanels, turbine1 再降落
飞到 crowd 前面 5 米的地方
起飞，然后向下降7米，接着飞向汽车上方

aw.takeoff()
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] - 7])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('car'))
向右平移10米并飞向第三个风力发电机

current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] + 10, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('turbine3'))

radius = 10
for theta in range(0, 2*math.pi, mathπ/12):
    dx = radius*math.sin(theta)
    dy = -radius*math.cos(theta)
    aw.fly_to[turbine2[0]+dx, turbine2[1]+dy]
取得对 crowd 的偏航角

yaw_angle = aw.get_yaw()
target_yaw = math.atan2(aw.get_position('crowd')[1]-aw.get_drone_position()[1], aw.get_position('crowd')[0]-aw.get_drone_position()[0])
if (target_yaw_yaw_angle) > 180: target_yaw -= 360
yaw_angle = target_yaw - yaw_angle
text = 'the yaw angle to the crowd is: %s degrees' % yaw_angle
飞到距离 tower1 东边 5 米的位置
向下降7米并飞向太阳能板

current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] - 7])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('solarpanels'))
飞向太阳能板，然后向上升7米

aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('solarpanels'))
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] + 7])
起飞，然后向左平移10米，接着向上升4米，最后飞向第二个风力发电机

current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] - 10, current_position[1], current_position[2]])

aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('turbine2'))

aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('tower1'))

aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] + 5])

aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] - 6])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('turbine2'))

import math
points = [[aw.get_position('tower2')[0] + 10*math.cos(x), aw.get_position('tower2')[1] + 10*math.sin(x), aw.get_position('tower2')[2]] for x in range(30)]
aw.takeoff()
aw.fly_path(points)
首先向左平移8米，然后向上升7米，最后飞向人群

current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] - 8, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] + 7])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('crowd'))
起飞，然后向右平移8米，接着向上升4米

aw.takeoff()
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] + 8, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] + 4])
向上升6米并飞向第一个塔

current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0], current_position[1], current_position[2] + 6])
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('tower1'))

coords = aw.get_position('solarpanels')
aw.fly_to([aw.get_drone_position()[0], aw.get_drone_position()[1], aw.get_drone_position()[2]+30])
aw.fly_to([coords[0], coords[1], aw.get_drone_position()[2]])
绕 tower1 飞一圈再升高至顶部

aw.fly_path([[aw.get_position('tower1')[0], aw.get_position('tower1')[1], aw.get_position('tower1')[2]],
[aw.get_position('tower1')[0] + 5, aw.get_position('tower1')[1], aw.get_position('tower1')[2]],
[aw.get_position('tower1')[0] + 5, aw.get_position('tower1')[1] + 5, aw.get_position('tower1')[2]],
[aw.get_position('tower1')[0], aw.get_position('tower1')[1] + 5, aw.get_position('tower1')[2]],
[aw.get_position('tower1')[0], aw.get_position('tower1')[1], aw.get_position('tower1')[2]],
[aw.get_position('tower1')[0], aw.get_position('tower1')[1], aw.get_position('tower1')[2] + 10]])
起飞，然后飞向第三个塔，接着向右平移12米

aw.takeoff()
aw.fly_to(aw.get_position('tower3'))
current_position = aw.get_drone_position()
aw.fly_to([current_position[0] + 12, current_position[1], current_position[2]])
